serviceOne.title: Screen Thousands of Candidates in Minutes
serviceOne.desc: Reviewing 1,000 profiles takes 3+ days for a recruiter at 1-2 minutes each - GoSourcer does it in 5 minutes

serviceOne.title: Stay true to your (real) requirements
serviceOne.desc: Effortlessly input your must-haves, nice-to-haves, and deal breakers - ensure your job requirements align perfectly with your needs, even the ones not published on the Job Description!

serviceOne.title: Align Candidates with Requirements
serviceOne.desc: Refine your requirements and run the AI engine as many times as needed to find the perfect match!

serviceOne.title: Quickly Discover Your Perfect Candidate
serviceOne.desc: Easily review a prioritized candidate list with grades, LinkedIn profiles, InMail messaging, and easy pipeline integration - all at your fingertips!

serviceOne.title: Unlock detailed, Insightful Candidate Report
serviceOne.desc: Our AI engine delivers more than just a score - get detailed insights across multiple dimensions, including candidate categorization and in-depth profile analysis for you to stay on top

serviceOne.title: Team of experts  dedicated to your success
serviceOne.desc: Our expert team is fully committed to empowering your success, providing tailored solutions and unwavering support every step of the way
